name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click for IFTTT Webhooks - unofficial

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Right Click button to trigger IFTTT Webhook passing dynamic variables links/page/text or it can be used as virtual buttons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to create custom buttons for IFTTT webhooks and pass dynamic variables of the selected item (Selected Text, Link, Image source )
also it can be used as a static virtual button trigger
